products.productname: Brighten up your festive look with this radiant yellow and cream lehenga set, featuring intricate floral embroidery and a stunning dupatta.

description.text: Step into elegance with our Sunshine Bloom Lehenga Set, a perfect blend of tradition and glamour. The lehenga is crafted in a soft cream base adorned with vibrant yellow floral embroidery and golden threadwork that adds a luminous touch. The matching sleeveless blouse comes with a square neckline and a bold lotus motif in the center, symbolizing grace and purity. The look is completed with a flowy yellow net dupatta detailed with delicate sequin and thread embroidery along the borders. Ideal for weddings, haldi ceremonies, festive gatherings, and special occasions.
Lehenga Fabric: Satin silk with organza overlay
Dupatta Fabric: Soft net with embroidery
Embroidery Work: Zari, resham thread, and sequin floral motifs
Inner Lining: Cotton lining for added comfort
Closure: Side zip and drawstring for the lehenga; back hook for blouse

products.productbrand: Regal Violet Banarasi Silk Lehenga Set
products.productname: Channel royal elegance in this rich violet lehenga set crafted in Banarasi silk, adorned with intricate zari motifs and a grand ethnic border.

description.text: Elevate your ethnic wardrobe with our Regal Violet Banarasi Silk Lehenga Set, an ode to timeless heritage and sophistication. Made from premium Banarasi silk, the lehenga features intricate woven zari motifs in golden beige across the skirt and hemline, depicting traditional elephant and palace scenes. The blouse is elaborately embroidered with floral threadwork and sequins, adding a touch of sparkle and richness. The look is completed with a matching purple dupatta showcasing delicate jaal patterns and a zari-bordered finish. Perfect for festive occasions, weddings, or traditional celebrations, this set brings royal charm to your presence.
Blouse Fabric: Brocade silk with embroidery
Dupatta Fabric: Silk blend with zari border
Work: Zari weaving, Resham embroidery, and mirror accents
Inner Lining: Cotton lining for comfort
Closure: Side zip and drawstring for lehenga; back hook closure for blouse

products.productname: A dreamy ivory lehenga set with multicolored floral embroidery, a heavily embroidered blouse, and a vibrant organza dupatta‚Äîperfect for day weddings and festive flair.

description.text: Unveil your vibrant charm with our Ivory Garden Threadwork Lehenga Set, a celebration of colors wrapped in elegance. This ethereal ivory lehenga features soft golden motifs all over and a richly embroidered border with mirror highlights. The real show-stealer is the blouse‚Äîheavily embellished with mirror work, zari, and multicolor thread embroidery, featuring a unique front-tie design and deep neckline. The dupatta, made from sheer net, is bordered with colorful embroidered lotus motifs and purple piping, creating a captivating play of tradition and brightness. Ideal for haldi ceremonies, Mehendi functions, or day weddings.
Lehenga Fabric: Art silk with sequin and zari butti
Blouse Fabric: Raw silk with multicolor embroidery and mirror work
Dupatta Fabric: Net with lotus motif threadwork and scalloped edges
Work: Zari, resham thread, mirrors, sequins
Closure: Side zip and drawstring for lehenga; back-tie and hook for blouse

products.productbrand: Pastel Harmony Aqua Silk Lehenga Set
products.productname: A serene pastel lehenga set with multicolor panel pleats, pearl-detailed blouse, and a luxurious aqua silk dupatta‚Äîperfect for elegant daytime celebrations.

description.text: Radiate effortless charm in our Pastel Harmony Aqua Silk Lehenga Set, an enchanting blend of subtle color, comfort, and grace. The lehenga features vertical pastel panels in hues of aqua, lemon yellow, and blush pink, creating a light and breezy look with traditional undertones. The fitted blouse is adorned with pearl embellishments, mirror detailing, and a soft sweetheart neckline with subtle layering. Completing the set is a vibrant aqua blue dupatta with woven zari border and gold foil patchwork, adding richness and finesse. Ideal for pre-wedding events, festive pujas, and summer weddings, this ensemble brings out your soft glam look in style.
Lehenga Fabric: Cotton-silk blend with multi-color pleated panels
Blouse Fabric: Silk with pearl and mirror work
Dupatta Fabric: Pure silk with zari border and patchwork
Work: Mirror, zari, pearl, light thread embroidery
Closure: Side zip and dori for lehenga; back hook and tie for blouse
Inner Lining: Soft cotton for all-day comfort

products.productname: A graceful blush pink lehenga set paired with a richly embroidered magenta dupatta and sequin blouse‚Äîdesigned for elegance at traditional celebrations.

description.text: Unleash timeless elegance with our Blush Royale Embroidered Lehenga Set. This ensemble features a flowing dusty pink lehenga adorned with subtle floral motifs and golden zari detailing along the hem. The blouse is crafted in matching pink-toned fabric with intricate thread and sequin embroidery, paired with elbow-length sleeves for a sophisticated look. The real charm lies in the contrasting magenta silk dupatta with ornate gold woven borders and scattered butti embroidery, finished with tassels for added flair. This lehenga set is a stunning choice for traditional ceremonies, weddings, or reception evenings.
Lehenga Fabric: Soft net with zari woven border and floral thread motifs
Blouse Fabric: Silk blend with sequin and thread embroidery
Dupatta Fabric: Art silk with zari border and woven motifs
Work: Zari, thread, and sequin embroidery
Closure: Side zip and drawstring for lehenga; hook-and-eye closure for blouse

products.productname: A regal mustard lehenga paired with an intricately embroidered kurti and a traditional copper-toned Banarasi dupatta‚Äîwhere heritage meets elegance.

description.text: Immerse yourself in tradition with our Saffron Heritage Banarasi Lehenga Set, a true celebration of Indian craftsmanship. The lehenga, crafted in rich mustard yellow silk, is delicately adorned with sequin butti work and bordered with woven mirror detailing and zari embroidery. The kurti-style blouse is the highlight‚Äîfeaturing elaborate thread and mirror work in earthy tones with a V-neck and ethnic panel detailing. Complementing the ensemble is a luxurious copper Banarasi dupatta with temple motifs and a fringed border, enhancing its timeless appeal. A perfect choice for weddings, Garba nights, or festive rituals steeped in culture.
Lehenga Fabric: Handloom silk with sequin and mirror butti work
Top Fabric (Kurti): Art silk with heavy thread and mirror embroidery
Dupatta Fabric: Banarasi jacquard with zari weave and tassels
Closure: Drawstring and side zip for lehenga; front hooks for kurti

products.productbrand: Blush Sequin Draped Saree with Embellished Blouse
products.productname: Turn heads in this blush peach draped saree set featuring shimmering sequins, a stylish pre-stitched pallu, and a stunning open-back blouse.

description.text: Make a bold statement with our Blush Sequin Draped Saree Set, designed for the modern woman who loves to blend glam with tradition. This pre-draped saree comes in a soft blush peach hue and is adorned with shimmering gold sequins all over. The saree is paired with a heavily embellished blouse featuring stone and sequin detailing and a daring open-back cut with elegant shoulder straps. With its graceful drape, luxurious texture, and contemporary silhouette, this outfit is perfect for cocktail nights, receptions, and high-end festive events.
Saree Fabric: Soft net with heavy sequin work
Blouse Fabric: Satin georgette with mirror, bead, and thread embroidery
Blouse Design: Sleeveless with deep V-back and side zip closure
Lining: Satin inner lining for smooth finish
Drape Style: Pre-stitched for easy wear

products.productname: A majestic navy blue floor-length Anarkali gown featuring intricate multicolor thread embroidery on the bodice and sleeves‚Äîan effortless blend of grace and tradition.

description.text: Step into timeless elegance with our Midnight Bloom Embroidered Anarkali Gown, designed for the woman who seeks both tradition and sophistication. This full-length navy blue gown features a structured bodice with exquisite multicolor floral and leaf embroidery, highlighted by folk-inspired motifs. The long sleeves and front-panel embroidery enhance its regal appeal, while the flowing georgette skirt adds softness and movement. With its modest silhouette and vibrant accents, this ensemble is ideal for formal festive events or elegant cultural celebrations.
Gown Fabric: Soft georgette with cotton lining
Top/Bodice Fabric: Art silk with multicolor thread embroidery
Sleeves: Full-length with intricate border detailing
Work: Thread, mirror accents, folk-style motifs
